name: Grimjaw Mimic

physical_description.appearance: A shapeshifting creature that can perfectly mimic humanoid appearance, including facial features, clothing, and mannerisms. In its true form, it appears as a gaunt humanoid with oversized jaw and sharp teeth.
distinguishing_features: Oversized jaw with multiple rows of teeth in true form
Eyes that don't quite match when examined closely
Five-fingered hands that feel cold to the touch

abilities.name: Perfect Mimicry
abilities.description: Can assume the exact appearance and mannerisms of observed humanoids

abilities.name: False Aura
abilities.description: Can project false divine influences to mystical detection

abilities.name: Predatory Instinct
abilities.description: Exceptional ability to identify and exploit weaknesses in humanoid psychology

habitat.territorial_behavior: Infiltrates communities, claims hunting grounds within settlements

lore_significance: Grimjaw Mimics represent the tragic potential for confusion between monsters and humanoids. Despite their perfect physical mimicry and high intelligence, they remain bound by the two-divine-influence limit and lack true humanoid heritage. Their predatory nature and inability to form genuine bonds reveal their monstrous nature, though distinguishing them from actual humanoids can be extremely difficult. They serve as a reminder that appearance alone does not determine true nature - only divine influence capacity reveals the fundamental difference between humanoid and monster.
